name: Battery
description: Every Electricity card you play in the next 3 turns adds 10 damage to battery buff. After 3 turns expel all damage and remove buff.

hooks.OnPlay: if (Card != null && Card.Suit.ToString() == "Electricity") { if (!State.ContainsKey("charge")) State["charge"] = 0; State["charge"] = (int)State["charge"] + 10; Log("Battery charged! Total: " + State["charge"] + " damage!"); }
